title: Did some Batman fanart in memory of Stan Lee.
body:
It's not done yet, just wanted to share it with everyone and get their input ^^

https://i.imgur.com/M3Gs8Kj.jpg

replies.body: Did not know about those comics.... definitely going to have to look for them. Thanks for bring them to my attention, also great art. Stan Lee's death has encouraged me to go back to working on my Captain America NPC in D&D.

I mean, it looks nice....but ~~Batman???~~

Whoa, did not know that he wrote a Batman comic, although it wasn't Bruce Wayne.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=7TxJ3VB6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-15T08:18:35.206+0000)
>
> I mean, it looks nice....but Batman???

Yeah, I was confused as well, but I Googled it and apparently Stan Lee did a comic for DC once.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Just_Imagine...
Ya I typed that out and thought....better look that up.
It's all good! I'm glad you like it (:
Yeah, why not Batman? He was always my favorite character of him growing up.
